Buttons and links

Buttons and links

Global styles for internal and external links.

On this page
  • Call to action buttons and links
  • In-text links
  • Page pagination
  • Examples and assets

Call to action buttons and links

Primary button

Light background

Primary
Button container
.primary-button {
    border: 2px solid #254F90;
    border-radius: 6px;
    padding: 8px 32px;
    text-align: center;
    background: #4569A0 0% 0% no-repeat padding-box;
    box-shadow:rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 2px 4px 0px;
    transition-property: transform, -webkit-transform;
    transition-duration: 0.4s, 0.4s;
    transition-timing-function: ease, ease;
    transition-delay: 0s, 0s; 
}
.primary-button:hover {
    background: #254F90 0% 0% no-repeat padding-box;
    box-shadow:rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3) 0px 4px 8px 0px;
    transform: translateY(-.1875rem);
}
.primary-button:active {
    background: #18335C 0% 0% no-repeat padding-box;
    box-shadow:rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3) 0px 4px 8px 0px;
    transform: translateY(-.1875rem);
}
Button text
a {
    color: #FFFFFF;
    font-family: OpenSans-Semibold;
    font-size: 16px
    line-height: 28px;
}

Dark background

Primary
Button container
.primary-button {
    border: 2px solid #254F90;
    border-radius: 6px;
    padding: 8px 32px;
    text-align: center;
    background: #FFFFFF 0% 0% no-repeat padding-box;
    box-shadow:rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 2px 4px 0px;
    transition-property: transform, -webkit-transform;
    transition-duration: 0.4s, 0.4s;
    transition-timing-function: ease, ease;
    transition-delay: 0s, 0s; 
}
.primary-button:hover {
    background: #254F90 0% 0% no-repeat padding-box;
    border: 2px solid #FFFFFF;
    transform: translateY(-.1875rem);
    box-shadow:rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3) 0px 4px 8px 0px;
}
.primary-button:active {
    background: #18335C 0% 0% no-repeat padding-box;
    border-color: #18335C;
}
Button text
a {
    color: #FFFFFF;
    font-family: OpenSans-Semibold;
    font-size: 16px
    line-height: 28px;
}
a:hover {
    color: #FFFFFF;
}

Secondary button

Light background

Secondary
Button container
.secondary-button {
    background: #FFFFFF 0% 0% no-repeat padding-box;
    border: 2px solid #4569A0;
    color: #4569A0;
    box-shadow:rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 2px 4px 0px;
    border-radius: 6px;
    padding: 8px 32px;
    text-align: center;
    letter-spacing: 0;
    transition-property: transform, -webkit-transform;
    transition-duration: 0.4s, 0.4s;
    transition-timing-function: ease, ease;
    transition-delay: 0s, 0s;  
}
.secondary-button:hover {
   background: #254F90 0% 0% no-repeat padding-box;
   border: 2px solid #18335C;
   transform: translateY(-.1875rem);
   box-shadow:rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3) 0px 4px 8px 0px;
}
.secondary-button:active {
   background: #18335C 0% 0% no-repeat padding-box;
   border: 2px solid #18335C;
}
Button text
a {
    color: #4569A0;
    font-family: OpenSans-Semibold;
    font-size: 16px
    line-height: 28px;
}
a:hover {
    color: #FFFFFF;
}

Dark background

Secondary
Button container
.secondary-button {
    border: 2px solid #FFFFFF;
    border-radius: 6px;
    padding: 8px 32px;
    text-align: center;
    background: #4569A0 0% 0% no-repeat padding-box;
    box-shadow:rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1) 0px 2px 4px 0px;
    transition-property: transform, -webkit-transform;
    transition-duration: 0.4s, 0.4s;
    transition-timing-function: ease, ease;
    transition-delay: 0s, 0s;
    
}
.secondary-button:hover {
    background: #254F90 0% 0% no-repeat padding-box;
    border: 2px solid #FFFFFF;
    transform: translateY(-.1875rem);
    box-shadow:rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3) 0px 4px 8px 0px;
}
.secondary-button:active {
    background: #18335C 0% 0% no-repeat padding-box;
    border-color: #18335C;
}
Button text
a {
    color: #FFFFFF;
    font-family: OpenSans-Semibold;
    font-size: 16px
    line-height: 28px;
}

Tertiary button

Light background

Tertiary button
a {
    color: #4569A0;
    font-family: OpenSans-Semibold;
    font-size: 16px;
    line-height: 28px;
    text-decoration: none;
    transition-property: transform, -webkit-transform;
    transition-duration: 0.4s, 0.4s;
    transition-timing-function: ease, ease;
    transition-delay: 0s, 0s;
}
a:hover {
    transform: translateY(-.1875rem);
}
.icon {    
    color: #4569A0;
    height: 16px;
    width: 16px;
}
.icon:hover {
    color: #4569A0;
    height: 32px;
    width: 32px;
}

    line-height: 28px;
    text-decoration: none;
    transition-property: transform, -webkit-transform;
    transition-duration: 0.4s, 0.4s;
    transition-timing-function: ease, ease;
    transition-delay: 0s, 0s;
}

    transform: translateY(-.1875rem);
}

    color: #FFFFFF;
    height: 16px;
    width: 16px;
}
.icon:hover {
    color: #FFFFFF;
    height: 32px;
    width: 32px;
}

In-text links

Primary links

Light background

Link text
a {
    color: #254F90;
    font-family: OpenSans-Semibold;
    font-size: 16px;
    line-height: 28px;
    text-decoration: none;
    box-shadow: inset 0 -3.2px 0 #748FB8;
}
a:hover {
    color: #254F90;
    box-shadow: inset 0 -20px 0 #DDEEFF;
    text-decoration: none;
}
a:active {
    color: #000000;
    box-shadow: inset 0 -20px 0 #DDEEFF;
    text-decoration: none;
}
a:visited {
    color: #A42079;
    box-shadow: inset 0 -20px 0 #DFB1D0;
    text-decoration: none;
}

Note: The visited link state is purple. Refer to the CSS above for text and underline colours.

Dark background

Link text
a {
    color: #FFFFFF;
    font-family: OpenSans-Semibold;
    font-size: 16px;
    line-height: 28px;
    text-decoration: none;
    box-shadow: inset 0 -2.8px 0 #FFFFFF;
}
a:hover {
    color: #254F90;
    box-shadow: inset 0 -20px 0 #96B7DF;
    text-decoration: none;
}
a:active {
    color: #212A4C;
    box-shadow: inset 0 -20px 0 #96B7DF;
    text-decoration: none;
}

Pagination links

Search results pagination links

First Previous 1 2 3 Next Last 
a {
    color: #254F90;
    padding: 0 6px;
    margin: 0 10px;  
    box-shadow: none;
    text-decoration: none;
}               
a:hover {
    color: #254F90;
    background: #E0EAF6;
    border-radius: 2px;
}
a:active {
    color: #333333;
    background: #B3C2D8;
    border-radius: 2px;
}
a.current {
    color: #333333;
    background: #E0EAF6;
    border-radius: 2px;
}
